resources.string: There are no events available for visitors. Log in to see the events.
This plugin displays a preview list of the latest events on the Overview page.
Number of events to be displayed. (default: 2)
If this setting is enabled the end date and end time of the event will be shown. Otherwise only the start date and start time will be displayed. (default: true)
Maximum number of characters in a word before a line break should be performed. (0: deactivates line break, default: 0)
If you only want to show events of a special category you can select the categories here. (default: all categories)
If this setting is enabled the full content of the description will be shown. Otherwise only a text preview will be displayed. (default: false)
Number of characters of the preview text. (0: no short preview, default: 70)
